tickets.summary: User authentication failing on mobile devices
tickets.description: Users are unable to log in through the mobile application. The authentication service returns a 500 error when processing login requests from mobile clients. This affects approximately 40% of our user base.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Users should be able to log in successfully through the mobile application using their valid credentials. The authentication process should complete within 2-3 seconds and redirect users to the main dashboard.
tickets.observedIssues: Mobile users receive a 500 internal server error when attempting to log in. The error occurs consistently across different mobile devices (iOS and Android). Desktop login works normally.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Open the mobile application
2. Enter valid username and password
3. Tap the 'Login' button
4. Observe the 500 error message
5. Note that the same credentials work on desktop
tickets.errorMessages:
HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
Authentication service unavailable
Stack trace: AuthenticationController.validateMobileCredentials() line 247

tickets.description: The main dashboard takes over 10 seconds to load for users with large datasets. Performance profiling shows inefficient database queries and excessive DOM manipulation.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Dashboard should load within 2-3 seconds even for users with large datasets. Charts and widgets should render progressively without blocking the main thread.
tickets.observedIssues: Dashboard takes 10-15 seconds to load completely. Users see a blank screen for the first 5 seconds, then widgets load one by one very slowly. Browser becomes unresponsive during loading.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Log in as a user with large dataset (>10k records)
2. Navigate to the main dashboard
3. Observe the loading time
4. Check browser performance tools
5. Note the slow rendering of widgets
tickets.errorMessages:
Warning: Long-running script detected
Memory usage exceeded 500MB
DOM manipulation blocking main thread for 3.2s

tickets.description: System email notifications for password resets and account updates are not being delivered to users. SMTP service appears to be functioning but emails are not reaching recipients.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Users should receive email notifications within 1-2 minutes for password resets, account updates, and system alerts. Emails should be properly formatted and contain all necessary information.
tickets.observedIssues: No emails are being delivered to users. SMTP logs show successful sending, but emails never reach inboxes. No bounce-back messages are received.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Request a password reset
2. Wait for email notification
3. Check inbox and spam folder
4. Verify SMTP logs show 'sent'
5. Confirm email never arrives
tickets.errorMessages:
SMTP: Message queued successfully
Delivery status: Unknown
No delivery confirmation received

tickets.description: Several UI components do not properly adapt to dark mode, causing readability issues and inconsistent visual appearance across the application.
tickets.expectedBehavior: All UI components should seamlessly adapt to dark mode with proper contrast ratios, readable text, and consistent theming throughout the application.
tickets.observedIssues: Some buttons remain light-colored in dark mode, text becomes unreadable on certain backgrounds, and icons don't change color appropriately.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Enable dark mode in user settings
2. Navigate through different pages
3. Observe inconsistent styling
4. Note unreadable text areas
5. Check button and icon colors
tickets.errorMessages:
CSS: Invalid color value for dark theme
Warning: Contrast ratio below accessibility standards

tickets.description: Application experiencing frequent database connection timeouts during peak hours, causing service disruptions and data loss.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Database connections should remain stable during peak hours with automatic failover and connection pooling managing high traffic loads efficiently.
tickets.observedIssues: Frequent timeout errors during 9-11 AM and 2-4 PM. Users experience failed transactions and data loss. Application becomes unresponsive.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Access application during peak hours
2. Perform database-intensive operations
3. Observe timeout errors
4. Check connection pool status
5. Monitor database performance metrics
tickets.errorMessages:
Connection timeout after 30 seconds
Pool exhausted: 0 of 20 connections available
Transaction rolled back due to timeout

tickets.description: Remove deprecated legacy features that are no longer used and causing maintenance overhead.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Legacy features should be cleanly removed without affecting current functionality. All references and dependencies should be properly cleaned up.
tickets.observedIssues: Legacy code is still present in the codebase, causing confusion for new developers and potential security vulnerabilities.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Review codebase for deprecated features
2. Identify unused legacy components
3. Check for any remaining dependencies
4. Verify no active usage
5. Plan removal strategy
tickets.errorMessages:
Deprecated API warning: LegacyAuthModule
Unused import detected: OldPaymentGateway

tickets.description: Users cannot upload images through the profile settings page. The upload button appears to work but files are not being processed.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Users should be able to upload images up to 5MB in size. The system should validate file types, resize if necessary, and provide upload progress feedback.
tickets.observedIssues: Upload button shows loading state but never completes. No error messages are displayed. Files are not saved to the server.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to profile settings
2. Click on 'Upload Image' button
3. Select a valid image file
4. Click upload
5. Observe that nothing happens
tickets.errorMessages:
File upload failed: No response from server
HTTP 413: Payload too large
Validation error: Unsupported file type

tickets.description: Customers are unable to complete purchases due to payment gateway integration errors. Error logs show API connection failures.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Payment processing should complete successfully within 10 seconds. Users should receive confirmation and be redirected to success page.
tickets.observedIssues: Payment gateway returns connection errors. Transactions fail at the final step. Customers are charged but orders are not created.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Add items to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Enter payment information
4. Click 'Complete Purchase'
5. Observe payment failure
tickets.errorMessages:
Gateway API Error: Connection refused
Payment processing failed: Invalid merchant ID
Transaction timeout after 30 seconds

tickets.description: The mobile application crashes immediately after startup for users on iOS 15. Crash logs indicate a memory allocation issue.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Mobile app should start successfully on all supported iOS versions and display the login screen within 3 seconds.
tickets.observedIssues: App crashes immediately on iOS 15 devices. Crash occurs before any UI is displayed. Works fine on iOS 14 and earlier versions.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Install app on iOS 15 device
2. Tap app icon to launch
3. Observe immediate crash
4. Check crash logs
5. Test on different iOS versions
tickets.errorMessages:
EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)
Memory allocation failed at startup
iOS 15 compatibility issue detected

tickets.description: The search functionality is returning irrelevant or incorrect results. The issue appears to be related to the search indexing process.
tickets.expectedBehavior: Search should return relevant results ranked by relevance. Results should match search terms and be displayed within 1 second.
tickets.observedIssues: Search returns unrelated results or no results for valid queries. Ranking appears random and doesn't match search terms properly.
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Enter a search term in the search box
2. Press enter or click search
3. Observe irrelevant results
4. Try different search terms
5. Note inconsistent behavior
tickets.errorMessages:
Search index out of sync
Elasticsearch query timeout
Ranking algorithm returned null

suggestedTickets.description: Similar authentication issues with mobile clients causing widespread login failures

suggestedTickets.summary: Mobile login failures during peak hours
suggestedTickets.description: Mobile authentication problems affecting user base during high traffic periods
Gateway issues causing authentication failures and service disruptions

suggestedTickets.summary: Session management bugs in mobile app
suggestedTickets.description: Mobile session handling causing authentication state issues
Connection pool issues leading to authentication service failures
Token validation service causing authentication rejections
Authentication cache not properly invalidating causing stale data
